Key Match Events: Syria scored three goals, with Mahmoud Al-Aswad, Daleho Irandust, and Pablo Sabbag contributing.
Syrian goalkeeper Elias Hadaya made significant saves to preserve the lead.
Pre-Game Insights: India's coach made seven changes to the lineup.
Syria's coach rotated all 11 players from their previous match.
Post-Match Reflections: India's coach expressed frustration with the first half performance but praised the second half effort.
Syria's coach was happy with his young squad's performance.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played in Hyderabad at the GMC Balayogi Gachibowli Stadium.
Syria's counterattacks were effective in securing the win.
